summary: WHILE  MY WIFE WAS GOING TO WORK  FEBRUARY 27,2003  THE KIA SEDONA'S  GAS PEDAL CONTINUED  TO JAM  WHICH  RESULTED IN IT TO  SPEED  UNCONTROLLABLE. WHEN I FOUND HER ON THE SIDE OF THE ROAD  SHE DIDN'T  WANT TO DRIVE IT, SO I DROVE TO THE DEALER, ITS BEEN THERE EVER SINCE UNABLE TO REPAIR IT.  *NLM
